text:
On Keeping Up With The Kardashians, Kim Kardashian stopped by John Legend and Chrissy Teigen‘s house. But John wasn’t the only Legend in the house. There was also a living legend, Chrissy’s dad, Ron Teigen. Ron is a vest designer and his daughter jokingly suggested that Kim promote them on her Instagram. And Ron Teigen isn’t just an entrepreneurial vest designer. He also knows a thing or two about reality television. “My dad is a big fan,” said Chrissy, “he’s been watching [KUWTK] for many years. When Chrissy asked him who his favorite Kardashian was he said, “Actually, you’re my favorite,” gesturing to Kim, “I thought Khloe was for a while, but then she kind of went off.”

With Ron Teigen throwing shade at Khloe, Chrissy was mildly mortified but living legend, Ron Teigen tells it like it is. “You don’t ask me questions unless you want answers,” he said.

Keeping Up With the Kardashians airs Sundays at 9 p.m. on E!

title: Chrissy Teigen's dad hilariously throws shade at Khloe Kardashian
